articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The suspect is a 50-year-old man from Saudi Arabia who has lived in Germany for almost two decades.
articles.title: Suspect in German Christmas market attack held on murder charges

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Six people were killed and others injured in an Israeli strike on a school sheltering displaced people in Gaza, the civil emergency service reported on Sunday.
articles.title: Six killed in Israeli strike on school sheltering displaced people in Gaza, civil emergency says

articles.author: Orhan Qereman, Tom Perry, Tuvan Gumrukcu
articles.description: With hostile Turkish-backed groups mobilising against them in Syria's north, and Damascus ruled by a group friendly to Ankara, Syria's main Kurdish factions are on the back foot as they seek to preserve political gains carved out during 13 years of war.
articles.title: Syrian Kurdish groups on the back foot as power balance shifts

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: China criticised new U.S. military aid to Taiwan on Sunday, saying the $571 million package seriously violates the "one China principle" and provisions of joint communiques between China and the U.S.
articles.title: China calls Taiwan a 'red line', criticises new US military aid to island

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: China said on Sunday it was taking countermeasures against two Canadian institutions and 20 people involved in human issues concerning the Uyghurs and Tibet.
articles.title: China takes steps against Canada institutions, individuals over Uyghurs, Tibet

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Ukraine's air defences downed 52 of the 103 Russian drones launched overnight, the Ukrainian military said on Sunday.
articles.title: Ukraine's air defence downs 52 out of 103 Russian drones, air force says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: All three people on board a plane that was forced to make an emergency landing in Russia's remote Kamchatka region have been found alive and well after a three-day search, officials said on Sunday.
articles.title: Trio aboard missing plane found alive in Russia's Kamchatka after three days

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Four people were killed in southwest Turkey on Sunday when an ambulance helicopter collided with a hospital building and crashed into the ground.
articles.title: Four killed in helicopter crash at Turkish hospital

articles.author: Thomas Escritt
articles.description: A spontaneous memorial created by grieving families and local residents at a church overlooking Magdeburg's Christmas market evolved during Saturday into something more politically charged.
articles.title: First grief, then a more political tone at site of Germany Christmas market attack

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Here is what we know so far about the man who was arrested as the suspected driver in a car-ramming attack on Friday at a Christmas market in the German city of Magdeburg in which five people were killed and some 200 injured.
articles.title: Germany Christmas market attack: what we know about the suspect
